Work Context Description: How much does this job require the worker to be in contact with others (face-to-face, by telephone, or otherwise) in order to perform it?
How much does this job require standing?
How important is it to work with external customers or the public in this job?
How often do you have to have face-to-face discussions with individuals or teams in this job?

Work Context: Work With Work Group or Team
Work Context Description: How important is it to work with others in a group or team in this job?
To what extent is this job structured for the worker, rather than allowing the worker to determine tasks, priorities, and goals?

Work Context: Spend Time Using Your Hands to Handle, Control, or Feel Objects, Tools, or Controls
Work Context Description: How much does this job require using your hands to handle, control, or feel objects, tools or controls?
How frequently is the worker required to make decisions that affect other people, the financial resources, and/or the image and reputation of the organization?
To what extent does this job require the worker to perform job tasks in close physical proximity to other people?
How much decision making freedom, without supervision, does the job offer?
How much does this job require making repetitive motions?

Work Context: Importance of Being Exact or Accurate
Work Context Description: How important is being very exact or highly accurate in performing this job?
How often does this job require working indoors in environmentally controlled conditions?

Work Context: Impact of Decisions on Co-workers or Company Results
Work Context Description: How do the decisions an employee makes impact the results of co-workers, clients or the company?
How important is repeating the same physical activities (e.g., key entry) or mental activities (e.g., checking entries in a ledger) over and over, without stopping, to performing this job?
How much does this job require walking and running?

Work Context: Deal With Unpleasant or Angry People
Work Context Description: How frequently does the worker have to deal with unpleasant, angry, or discourteous individuals as part of the job requirements?
How often do you have telephone conversations in this job?

Work Context: Responsible for Others' Health and Safety
Work Context Description: How much responsibility is there for the health and safety of others in this job?
How important is it to coordinate or lead others in accomplishing work activities in this job?
How often are there conflict situations the employee has to face in this job?

Work Context: Sounds, Noise Levels Are Distracting or Uncomfortable
Work Context Description: How often does this job require working exposed to sounds and noise levels that are distracting or uncomfortable?
How responsible is the worker for work outcomes and results of other workers?

Work Context: Exposed to Minor Burns, Cuts, Bites, or Stings
Work Context Description: How often does this job require exposure to minor burns, cuts, bites, or stings?

Work Context: Spend Time Bending or Twisting the Body
Work Context Description: How much does this job require bending or twisting your body?
To what extent does this job require the worker to compete or to be aware of competitive pressures?
Number of hours typically worked in one week.
How often does this job require working in extremely bright or inadequate lighting conditions?
How often do you have to perform public speaking in this job?
How often does this job require working exposed to contaminants (such as pollutants, gases, dust or odors)?
How frequently does this job require the worker to deal with physical aggression of violent individuals?
How regular are the work schedules for this job?
How serious would the result usually be if the worker made a mistake that was not readily correctable?

Work Context: Spend Time Kneeling, Crouching, Stooping, or Crawling
Work Context Description: How much does this job require kneeling, crouching, stooping or crawling?
How often does this job require the worker to meet strict deadlines?
How often does the job require written letters and memos?
How often does this job require working indoors in non-controlled environmental conditions (e.g., warehouse without heat)?
How often does this job require exposure to disease/infections?

Work Context: Spend Time Keeping or Regaining Balance
Work Context Description: How much does this job require keeping or regaining your balance?
How often does this job require working outdoors, exposed to all weather conditions?
How often does this job require working in very hot (above 90 F degrees) or very cold (below 32 F degrees) temperatures?
How automated is the job?
How often does this job require working in cramped work spaces that requires getting into awkward positions?
How often does this job require working outdoors, under cover (e.g., structure with roof but no walls)?

Work Context: Wear Common Protective or Safety Equipment such as Safety Shoes, Glasses, Gloves, Hearing Protection, Hard Hats, or Life Jackets
Work Context Description: How much does this job require wearing common protective or safety equipment such as safety shoes, glasses, gloves, hard hats or life jackets?

Work Context: In an Open Vehicle or Equipment
Work Context Description: How often does this job require working in an open vehicle or equipment (e.g., tractor)?
How much does this job require sitting?
How often do you use electronic mail in this job?
How often does this job require exposure to hazardous conditions?

Work Context: Pace Determined by Speed of Equipment
Work Context Description: How important is it to this job that the pace is determined by the speed of equipment or machinery? (This does not refer to keeping busy at all times on this job.)

Work Context: In an Enclosed Vehicle or Equipment
Work Context Description: How often does this job require working in a closed vehicle or equipment (e.g., car)?

Work Context: Spend Time Climbing Ladders, Scaffolds, or Poles
Work Context Description: How much does this job require climbing ladders, scaffolds, or poles?
How often does this job require exposure to high places?
How often does this job require exposure to hazardous equipment?

Work Context: Wear Specialized Protective or Safety Equipment such as Breathing Apparatus, Safety Harness, Full Protection Suits, or Radiation Protection
Work Context Description: How much does this job require wearing specialized protective or safety equipment such as breathing apparatus, safety harness, full protection suits, or radiation protection?
How often does this job require exposure to whole body vibration (e.g., operate a jackhammer)?
